Class MemoryGameComponentView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.memorycard.MemoryGameComponentView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class MemoryGameComponentView
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    A Swing component for playing the Memory Card Game
    Version:
    CS56 Winter 2018
    Author:
    Bryce McGaw and Jonathan Yau (with some of Phill Conrad's code as a basis), Ryan Halbrook and Yun Suk Chang, Mathew Glodack, Christina Morris, Xiaohe He, Shaoyi Zhang, Hyemin Yoo, Annan Zhang, Shihua Lu
    See Also:
    MemoryGrid, Serialized Form
